刊.definition: to print; to publish; publication; periodical; to peel with a knife; to carve; to amend

刊印.definition: to set in print; to diffuse; to publish

刊登.definition: to carry a story; to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)

刊發.definition: (of a newspaper or magazine) to publish (an article, story, report etc); to carry

刊誤表.definition: variant of 勘誤表|勘误表[kan1 wu4 biao3]
